data.name: 0000 (198.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I just thought, Koizumi's phone received a call earlier…

data.name: 0001 (198.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: From who?

data.name: 0002 (198.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I have no idea who it was from. That's not the point I'm trying to make.

data.name: 0003 (198.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Well, what is your point then?

data.name: 0004 (198.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Though it's the summer holiday, you're not allowed to use phones in the school, right?

data.name: 0005 (198.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: If someone like Okabe saw it, it'd be confiscated.

data.name: 0006 (198.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Even you've brought one though, haven't you?

data.name: 0007 (198.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: That's… Well, I suppose.

data.name: 0008 (198.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: How are we supposed to enjoy the camp if you're so strict? Think more leniently.

data.name: 0009 (198.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Leniently, huh…

data.name: 0010 (198.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Well, there is some merit to what you say. If Okabe takes one, we'll have to steal it back.

data.name: 0011 (198.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: We'd have to sneak in and plunder the staff room.

data.name: 0012 (198.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: That's not what I was getting at…

data.name: 0013 (198.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Umm, I just thought...

data.name: 0014 (198.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I can listen while we walk. What's up?

data.name: 0015 (198.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: It looked like Koizumi used his phone in school.

data.name: 0016 (198.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Even I'm using one, you know? For calling Kyon and stuff…

data.name: 0017 (198.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: We might get told off if the night duty teacher sees us using them.

data.name: 0018 (198.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: If Okabe sees? Why?

data.name: 0019 (198.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Well, using a phone in school grounds breaks various rules, so…

data.name: 0020 (198.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Mikuru, we're on summer break right now, you know? It's not a school day.

data.name: 0021 (198.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: A little bit of phone use is fine.

data.name: 0022 (198.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: If you say so…

data.name: 0023 (198.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Let's hurry, Yuki. It's Kyon we're dealing with, so there's no doubt he's slacking off.

data.name: 0024 (198.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: …If we create contact via mobile telephone, we can accurately grasp the situation.

data.name: 0025 (198.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: You want me to ring Kyon's phone?

data.name: 0026 (198.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: Itsuki Koizumi is also in possession of a mobile phone.

data.name: 0027 (198.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Good point--Koizumi had one as well, didn't he.

data.name: 0028 (198.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: But not right now. It's better to tackle Kyon directly.

data.name: 0029 (198.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: If you'd like, why don't you call him, Yuki? You've got a phone on you, right?

data.name: 0030 (198.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: Not now…

data.name: 0031 (198.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: That's fine--I'm not gonna force you or anything. You're more of a considerate type.

data.name: 0032 (198.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Then let's bring up the pace and hurry to the scene.

data.name: 0034 (198.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: It seems everyone has brought a phone with them for our summer camp this time.

data.name: 0035 (198.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I suppose you're right. It's convenient since the campus is so big.

data.name: 0036 (198.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I've brought one myself, though if found out by Mr Okabe, we'll be in trouble.

data.name: 0037 (198.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Though it's the summer holiday, I feel a little uncomfortable using my phone.

data.name: 0038 (198.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Don't worry--If it gets confiscated, we'll just steal it back. No problem.

data.name: 0039 (198.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I feel like I'd still class that as a problem…
